REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1001 reute d f BC-SINGER-<SMF>-GETS-EIG 03-23 0066

TEXT.TITLE: SINGER <SMF> GETS EIGHT MLN DLR ARMY CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Singer Co said its Dalmo Victor Division has received an eight mln dlr contract for full-scale engineering development of a special version of the APR-39A radar threat warning system. It said the contract calls for delivery of 20 development units and includes an option for an initial production quantity of 300 units. Reuter
